seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years software development experience + 1+ years data engineering experience, title doesn't include 'Senior' but experience suggests mid-level (3-5 years range)

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Software & Data Engineer', core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, workflows, data integrations, and data logic within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Role focused on Palantir Foundry platform development with data pipelines and integrations, but no specific emphasis on streaming, batch ETL, or other specialized areas mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: Collaborative role with Product Owner and other engineers, no mention of direct reports, mentoring, or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job posting, Palantir Foundry is platform-agnostic

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions data pipelines and workflows but no specific emphasis on streaming (Kafka, real-time) or batch processing patterns

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.), work within Palantir Foundry platform

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data storage technologies mentioned (warehouse, lake, lakehouse), work within Palantir Foundry ecosystem

remote_restriction.evidence: Work model stated as 'onsite' with location restriction to 'Berthoud, CO', requires physical presence in specific location

timezone_focus.evidence: US Citizenship or Permanent Residency required, located in Colorado (Mountain Time Zone), but no specific timezone overlap requirements mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite role in Berthoud, CO with citizenship/residency requirement implies need to relocate to Colorado area

h1b_friendly.evidence: Pass1 extraction shows 'must_be_authorized' with 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residency' requirement, no visa sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization requirement with citizenship/permanent residency suggests no student visa (OPT/CPT) support

citizenship_required.evidence: Pass1 extraction shows 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residency' requirement explicitly stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' with comprehensive benefits package including 401k, health insurance, equity grants

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including unlimited PTO, paid parental leave, health insurance, 401k with match, equity grants, and additional voluntary options

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, advancement opportunities, or growth paths mentioned in job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other engineers but no formal mentorship program or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned in job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required qualifications (US citizenship, 1-5 years experience, Palantir Foundry) and desired experience (manufacturing/industrial systems)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on Palantir Foundry development with well-defined responsibilities for data engineering within that platform

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are reasonable for mid-level role: 1-5 years experience, specific platform knowledge (Palantir Foundry), appropriate technical skills
